short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A de-make of the original Mario Kart in the style of Pole Position on Atari 2600

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you love Mario Kart for the Super Nintendo? Do you love Pole Position for the Atari 2600? No? Well, you didn't ask for it, but you got it... A conceptual nightmare of a game that takes the best of everything from Mario Kart, the best of everything from Pole Position, throws them out the window and gives you this abomination. Behold! Atariokart 2600.

Featuring five tracks loosely based on the Mushroom Cup courses (plus a secret bonus track), poor controls, and frustrating collision detection! It's got all your favorite characters: Atario, Loogy, Rick, Shroom, and many more! Atariokart 2600 is guaranteed to occupy your time for a little while!
